person.persName: Charles Allen Purdy (Kenton County, Kentucky, laborer and soldier.)

body.p: Kenton County, Kentucky, laborer and soldier. Ohio native. Son of Aaron Purdy and Elizabeth Purdy. Attended school in Kenton Count in 1850. Laborer in Kenton County in 1860. Served in the Fremont Body Guard (U.S.A.) as a private from August 1861, to November 30, 1861. Served in the 11th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a first lieutenant from November 28, 1862, to April 1, 1864.
